description.narrative: This activity (Routine Immunisation (PRRINN) - Procurement of Services) is a component of Routine Immunisation reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £28,435,544. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Basic health care, Infectious disease control, Health education. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, DAI Global Health, Mott MacDonald Limited, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 27-10-2006 and the end date is 31-07-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
